description:
The quiet and expressionless follower of Yuki. She has unshakable loyalty to Yuki and one other master. She also holds a position in the student council to support Yuki at school as the secretary of general affairs. Perhaps because sheâ€™s a bit out of touch with the world, she`s often tricked and teased by Yuki.
Source: Official page
name: Kimishima Ayano
